objections.label: "I need to think about it"
objections.script: Totally get it. When most people say they need to think about it, it usually means one of three things: timing, money, or uncertainty it’ll work for them. Which bucket are you in?
bullets: Normalize the objection; don’t fight it.
Clarify the real bucket before trying to handle it.
Once they pick a bucket, stay focused there.
objections.notes: Document best follow-ups you hear from other closers here.
